mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLUB( CLUB_NAME, READER_NO, CATEGORY_ID, MEMBERS_LIMIT, AGE_LIMIT_START, AGE_LIMIT_END, AREA, ONE_LINE_INTRO, INTRO) VALUES (#{clubName}, #{readerNo}, #{categoryId}, #{membersLimit},#{ageLimitStart},#{ageLimitEnd},#{area},#{oneLineIntro},#{intro})
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM CLUB
AND CLUB_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND AREA LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT c.*, cc.CATEGORY_NAME, (SELECT STORED_IMAGE_NAME FROM UPLOAD_IMAGE WHERE CLUB_NAME IN(c.CLUB_NAME)) AS IMAGE_STR, (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM CLUB_USER WHERE CLUB_NAME = #{clubName}) AS MEMBERS_COUNT FROM CLUB c LEFT JOIN club_category cc ON c.CATEGORY_ID = cc.CLUB_CATEGORY_ID where c.CLUB_NAME = #{clubName}
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM CLUB_USER WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND CLUB_NAME = #{clubName} AND IN_CK = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM CLUB_USER WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND CLUB_NAME = #{clubName} AND IN_CK = 'N'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CLUB_USER WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND CLUB_NAME = #{clubName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLUB_USER (USER_NO, CLUB_NAME, IN_CK) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{clubName}, 'N')
mapper.select:
SELECT A.*, M.ID FROM CLUB_USER A JOIN Member M ON M.MEMBER_NO = A.USER_NO WHERE A.CLUB_NAME = #{clubName} AND A.IN_CK = 'N'
AND M.ID LIKE '%' || #{id} || '%'

SELECT A.*, M.ID FROM CLUB_USER A JOIN Member M ON M.MEMBER_NO = A.USER_NO WHERE A.CLUB_NAME = #{clubName} AND A.IN_CK = 'Y'
AND M.ID LIKE '%' || #{id} || '%'
AND A.USER_NO NOT IN (SELECT READER_NO FROM CLUB WHERE CLUB_NAME = #{clubName})
